text.value: [pt-BR]Select to view statistics for all billing groups in this interval.
[pt-BR]Find a payer's billing group for this interval.
[pt-BR]Please wait while billing groups are populated...
[pt-BR]Create a pull list for this billing group.
[pt-BR]View Billing Process Adapter history for this billing group in this interval.
[pt-BR]Select to view statistics for this billing group and interval.

[pt-BR]A pull list is used to remove accounts from the current billing group. These accounts will be placed in this newly created billing group. Specify either account IDs separated by returns or username comma namespace pairs separated by returns.

[pt-BR]A pull list file is used to remove accounts from the current billing group. These accounts will be placed in this newly created billing group. The file format is a UTF-8 encoded text file that specifies either account IDs separated by returns or username comma namespace pairs separated by returns.
[pt-BR]Your system has valid billing group definitions, but the system has not assigned payers to groups for this interval. Please click the Create Billing Groups for Interval button above.
[pt-BR]This interval does not have any paying accounts or any accounts to invoice. It can be hard closed directly by clicking on the button below.
[pt-BR]Create a temporary billing group for this interval in order to bill for unassigned accounts.
[pt-BR]Accounts That Had Reported Failures For This Adapter Run
[pt-BR]No accounts with reported failures were found. Either this adapter did not report any batches or in the reported batches there were no failures against particular accounts.
[pt-BR]New Accounts Can Be Invoiced For This Interval
[pt-BR]New Accounts Will Not Be Invoiced For This Interval
